duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Tier 1 & 2 support for all assigned support desk incident requests following the ITIL framework for service management.
Manage, sort, and track service requests. Ensure proper recording, documentation, and closure in the help desk tracking system.
Develop standard procedures for recurring service request issues.
Create documentation on standard support resolutions and publish this documentation accordingly for future reference.
Perform routine patching for desktops and laptops utilizing WSUS.
Perform administration tasks in Microsoft Office 365, maintaining security account access and authorizations for new and existing end-users.
Maintain and Administer Desktop/Laptop encryption process.
Execute basic administrative tasks in the VOIP phone system.
Implement special projects or tasks as assigned.
Contribute to Infrastructure initiatives for more efficiency and optimal performance for users.
Maintain ownership of the workstation management with full responsibility and follow through.
Work closely with 3rd party providers related to software and/or services.
Ensure that operating & project related spending remains well within budget parameters.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related MIS discipline preferred.
